property.value: ■ Draw 3 cards. Then you may choose a water card in your hand that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your hand. If you do, use that card from your hand for no cost.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMEX-09 W-Team Docking Pack: Team Kirifuda & Team Wave

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal one and put it into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If the card revealed this way was a fire or nature card, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand.

property.value: {BUZZRENDER}(2) (When you pay this creature's cost, you may pay any number of additional (2). When you put this creature into the battle zone, use its Buzzrender ability once and the number of additional times you paid (2).) {BUZZRENDER}: Draw a card, then discard a card from your hand. ■ If there are 5 or more cards in your graveyard, this creature gets +5000 power and has "double breaker". (A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)
